name: Nova Slayer
description:
"In the Andromeda Galaxy, 

Where life is threated by the Nova Invasion,

There's only one hero to stop them,

The Nova Slayer."

This is my first project made in Unity, which I make as an university exam, and the one I'm proud to show to everyone to test it out.

You will play as the Nova Slayer in a retro 2D Shoot'Em'Up ambience, where you will defeat all your enemies with a selected weaponry and power ups to help you clear the four levels this demo has. You can play in three different difficulty levels, each one with different mechanics wich make more or less the game challenging.

I hope you find this demo enjoyable and fun to play.

I look forward to your feedback, which I'll use to improve the game and make it more complete and can continue in this path of the Game Development I recently started and enjoyed since the first day.
